description: For authentic Thai-inspired flavours, go for Mamaâ€™s range of instant noodles. The jumbo 90g packets offer a quick and convenient way to get your favourite Thai noodle dishes on your dinner table.
name: Tom Yum Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180g Mama Shrimp (Tom Yum) Flavour instant noodles

recipeInstructions.text: Combine paste, milk, stock, lime juice, soy sauce, sugar and half of the chilli in a medium saucepan. Stir in all flavour sachets from noodle packets. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Simmer for 2 minutes to allow flavours to infuse.
Add noodles and choy sum, and cook for 2 minutes or until noodles have softened.
Divide noodle mixture among bowls. Serve topped with onion, shallots, coriander and remaining chilli.
